subject: My Dearest in Chris:
body:
My Dearest in Chris: 
How are you and your beloved family doing?
 
Compliments of the day to you and with due respect, trust and humility, I write this letter to you in regards to your response towards my request and am very sorry for my late response. I want you to know that it is because of my present healthy condition and please note that I really need your full assistance in this transaction, I promise you that you will never regret helping me in this transaction because this transaction is 100% legal. I thank God that connected me to you because I have been looking for a good person that will honestly help me to achieve this. My dreams now are still alive and will also take good care of my only son Rayn if I do not survive this illness. 
 
Meanwhile after going through your email, i understand that you are more than willing and sincere to assist me in this my project regardless that we have not meet each other in person, but i believe in faith because I’m a Christian, with faith we can move mountains according to my believe and with your response, I don't really need a prophet to tell me that you are a good person, I know you are a God sent. Please let me first explain myself more to you before we proceed, I am Mrs. Gill Marcus from South Africa. I am the Former governor of South Africa reserve bank being the ninth person and the first and only woman to hold the position; I adopted a child which I named him Rayn Marcus. He is 11years old and still in high school.
 
Our  home address is No.95 Dorp Street, Bo Kaap, Cape Town, because I will like you to come and see me in person after the transaction because the doctor told me recently that I will not last or live more than a year due to my cancer, although what disturbs me most is my stroke, having known my present health condition I decided to donate this fund to church or to a good Christian individual who will utilize this money the way I am going to instruct herein and note that this transaction is strictly confidential.
 
All I require from you is that you please help me to donate a part of the money towards some charity organizations because I am in and out of hospital due to my poor health and the stress of worrying about my son’s well-being after I am no more is weighing very heavily on my shoulder, Listen to me right now because I want to use this opportunity to instruct you on how you will use this fund, the total amount which will be transfer to your account is 30.5million US dollars and  I will offer you 30% of the principal sum of the amounts that will be transferred  into your account for your assistance, you will keep 20% out of the fund for my only son Rayn so he can have a better future, the remaining balance of 50% will be shared to orphanages, churches, research centers and widows. Especially the ones that deal with the issue of cancer as this one is dear to my heart.
 
 
Attached below is my pictures for you to know who you are assisting in her transaction and I will also be sending you the copy of my passport proof of the funds and the certificate of deposit in my next email as well for you to used it to contact my bank manager which I will provide you his information on my next email, please send me your personal information your pictures as well for me to know you more and know who I am working with and also to use it to obtain an authorization letter and to proceed the transaction with you, the information's I want you to provide me are below.
 
(1) Your home address
(2) Your personal telephone number
(3) Tell me more about your occupation
(4) Tell me brief about your family
(5) Send me your pictures
(6) Finally, promise from your heart that you will help me achieve this dream even if I did not survive this illness.
Please kindly respond back to me immediately and provide me with this information I requested from you to enable us to proceed and please call me on the phone number below because I would like to speak to you.
I wait to hear from you
 
Thank you so much, your sister in Lord
Mrs. Gill Marcus.
My Private Phone:   +27-73-708-3005

subject: Re:   My Dearest in Chris:
body:
Hello Mrs. Gill Marcus,

I'm deeply touched by your story and I'm sorry to hear about your health condition. It's truly inspiring to see your determination and faith in such difficult times. Your son Rayn must be very proud of you.

It's a noble cause that you're pursuing, donating funds towards charity and research centers dealing with cancer. It's indeed a terrible disease that has affected many lives around the world, including yours.

However, I must apologize as I can't provide my personal details like home address, telephone number or pictures due to privacy reasons. But rest assured, I'm more than willing to help in any way possible without sharing these details.

Could you please share more information about how exactly I can assist you? Are there specific charities or organizations you have in mind for the donations? Also, could you tell me more about your son Rayn? What are his interests and aspirations?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Michael
